title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
2 points maximum

2 points; both points must be earned from the same row.

· fermentation | (lactic) acid/lactate

· anaerobic respiration | acid

· glycolysis | (pyruvic) acid/pyruvate

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point maximum

Prediction (1 point)

· S. mutans decreases AND S. sanguinis increases
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

Prediction (1 point)

· S. mutans decreases AND S. sanguinis increases

The student response earns one of the following points:

· S. mutans decreases AND S. sanguinis increases
